articles.title: Niger's Military Announces Coup; Soldiers Detain President: 5 Points - NDTV
articles.description: Soldiers claim to have overthrown Niger's government following an apparent coup in the West African nation on Wednesday when members of the Presidential Guard detained President Mohamed Bazoum.
articles.content: <li>According to The Guardian, the military takeover marks the seventh coup in west and central Africa since 2020, and could further complicate western efforts to help countries in the Sahel region f… [+820 chars]
